text.__SUMMARY__:
Astragalus geminiflorus is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found only in Ecuador.
Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical high-altitude grassland.
text.References: Neill, D. & Pitman, N. (2004). "Astragalus geminiflorus". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2004: e.T45214A10986025. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2004.RLTS.T45214A10986025.en. Retrieved 20 December 2017.
